items.sentence: I could be wrong, but I think Tom wants to go home early.
Tom likes Mary\'s younger sister more than he likes Mary.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want Mary at his party.
Tom can\'t speak French. Mary can\'t speak French either.
Tom died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the head.
Tom made a list of things he wanted to do before he died.
Tom never fails to send a birthday present to his father.
Tom says he can pluck a chicken in less than ten minutes.
Tom says he wants to spend the rest of his life with you.
I\'m pretty sure Tom isn\'t going to be at Mary\'s party.
